roleset.name: separate, divide

role.descr: source, separated from, if separate from arg1

roles.note: With nominal rels, arg0 may be realized as the distinguishing characteristic itself. See example.

example.name: all args; within LVC
example.text: The article starts by mentioning the vision of lifelogging, and *PRO* making the distinction of lifelogging from other PIM activities as follows...

roleset.note: Based on verb entry distinguish.01. No corresponding VN class.

example.name: nominal rel: distinction; arg0 is the distinguishing characteristic
example.text: We should seriously consider why is there such an inferior - quality and uncivilized organization as the " Dog Forum " faction present in our Mainland China which holds the distinction of being a country renowned for civilization and ceremonial rituals ?
example.note: rephrase: 'being a country renownded for civilization and ceremonial rituals distinguishes the Dog Forum faction'.
example.arg: of being a country renowned for civilization and ceremonial rituals

example.name: with PRD
example.text: We should seriously consider why is there such an inferior - quality and uncivilized organization as the " Locust Forum " faction present in Hong Kong , China which holds the distinction as ' World Citizen ' ?
